text: "Brother" is a 1992 song by Alice in Chains. It is the opening track from their acoustic EP Sap. The song was included on both their 1999 album Music Bank and 2006 album The Essential Alice in Chains. ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Folk ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Brother (Alice in Chains song)
